Name: Knickerbocker Special
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Slightly sweet and very fruity with raspberry and pineapple to the fore. Made with freshly prepared homemade raspberry syrup (1½:1) this is particularly delicious.
History: The Knickerbocker Special first appears in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book . For the full story see our Knickerbocker Cocktails page.
Nutrition: One serving of Knickerbocker Special contains 213 calories
